title: For Sale:  Cy Young, Bare Hand Shows, PSA 1 - Price dropped!

posts.post_title: For Sale:  Cy Young, Bare Hand Shows, PSA 1 - Price dropped!
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
I currently have the following T206s HOFers for sale (front and back scans provided below).  First come, first serve.  All prices include delivery.  Paypal fine, with no additional surcharge.  Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any!  

T206 Cy Young, bare hand shows, PSA 1 (nice front, but paper loss on back) - $220

T206 Walter Johnson, pitching, PSA 2 (Polar Bear) - **SOLD, via eBay**
T206 Cy Young, portrait, PSA 1 - **TRADED, thanks Dan**
T206 Christy Mathewson, white cap, PSA 2 (great centering) - **SOLD, thanks David**
T206 Nap Lajoie, with bat, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Steve**
T206 Nap Lajoie, throwing, PSA 1 - **SOLD, thanks Jim**
T206 Rube Waddell, portrait, PSA 2 - **SOLD, thanks Rob**

Regards,
Adam
aamoniz@yahoo.com
